room_title: Escape room "Jungle Room" by Escape Room Novi in Detroit
review: We had a blast. The Jungle room was really fun and it was nicely themed. The puzzles were hard and you definitely had to work as a team. We made it out with 8 minutes to spare.

room_title: Escape room "Jungle Room" by Escape Room Novi in Detroit
review: We tried the Jungle Room and we had great fun. All their clues worked and we had a great time solving the puzzles. All of my team members could contribute. In this room, you will have to work separately in smaller groups to gather the clues and bring them to the table. All in all, we had a great time. We will be back for more
